data.name: command_export_help_description
data.value: Given a template.config file, creates a "localize" directory next to it and exports the localization files into the created directory. If the localization files already exist, the existing translations will be preserved.
data.comment: The phrase "localization files" here mean the files that will be given to the translators to be localized.

data.name: command_export_help_dryrun_description
data.value: If this option is specified, modified files will not be saved to file system and the changes will only be printed to console output.

data.name: command_export_help_language_description
data.value: The list of languages to be supported by this template. The following language list will be used as default if this option is omitted: cs, de, en, es, fr, it, ja, ko, pl, pt-BR, ru, tr, zh-Hans, zh-Hant

data.name: command_export_help_recursive_description
data.value: When specified, subdirectories are also searched for template.json files.

data.name: command_export_help_templatePath_description
data.value: Specifies the path to the template.json file. If a directory is given, template.json file will be searched within the directory. If --recursive options is specified, all the template.json files under the given directory and its subdirectories will be taken as input.

data.name: command_export_log_cancelled
data.value: "export" command for the following file was cancelled: "{0}".

data.name: command_export_log_executionEnded
data.value: Execution of "export" command has completed. {0} files were processed.
data.comment: {0} is the number of files. Do not localize "export"

data.name: command_export_log_templateExportFailedWithError
data.value: Generating localization files for a template.json has failed. Reason: {0}. File Path: {1}.
data.comment: {0} is a sentence such as "Json property should contain a field 'ID'" {1} is a file path such as: C:\temp\template.json Do not localize: "template.json"

data.name: command_export_log_templateExportFailedWithException
data.value: Generating localization files for the following template.json file has failed: "{0}".

data.name: command_export_log_templateExportSucceeded
data.value: Localization files were successfully generated for the template.json file at path "{0}".

data.name: command_export_log_templateJsonNotFound
data.value: Failed to find "template.json" file under the path "{0}".

data.name: command_verify_error_failed
data.value: Verification Failed.

data.name: command_verify_error_unrecognizedArguments
data.value: Argument(s) {0} are not recognized. Must be one of: {1}.
data.comment: {0} and {1} is both a list of arguments

data.name: command_verify_help_customExcludes_description
data.value: Specifies pattern(s) defining files to be excluded from verification.

data.name: command_verify_help_customIncludes_description
data.value: Specifies pattern(s) defining files to be included to verification (all files are included if not specified).

data.name: command_verify_help_description
data.value: Runs the template with specified arguments and compares the result with expectations files.

data.name: command_verify_help_disableDefaultExcludes_description
data.value: If set to true - all template output files will be verified, unless --exclude-pattern option is used.
data.comment: Do not translate 'true'. Do not translate '--exclude-pattern'

data.name: command_verify_help_disableDiffTool_description
data.value: If set to true - the diff tool won't be automatically started by the Verifier on verification failures.

data.name: command_verify_help_expectFailure_description
data.value: If set to true - 'dotnet new' command is expected to return non-zero return code.
data.comment: Do not translate 'true'. Do not translate 'dotnet new'

data.name: command_verify_help_outputPath_description
data.value: Specifies the path to target directory to output the generated template to.

data.name: command_verify_help_scenarioName_description
data.value: Specifies optional scenario name to be used in the snapshot folder name.

data.name: command_verify_help_snapshotsDirPath_description
data.value: Specifies path to the directory with snapshot files.

data.name: command_verify_help_templateName_description
data.value: Name of the template to be verified. Can be already installed template or a template within local path specified with -p/--template-path option.

data.name: command_verify_help_templatePath_description
data.value: Specifies the path to the directory with template to be verified.

data.name: command_verify_help_uniqueFor_description
data.value: Sets the Verifier expectations directory naming convention, by indicating which scenarios should be differentiated.

data.name: command_verify_help_verifyOutputs_description
data.value: If set to true - 'dotnet new' command standard output and error contents will be verified along with the produced template files.
data.comment: Do not translate 'true'. Do not translate 'dotnet new'

data.name: generic_log_commandExecutionFailed
data.value: "{0}" command has encountered an error. See the logs for more details.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the command name. Such as: "export" command has encountered an error.

data.name: generic_log_commandExecutionFailedWithErrorMessage
data.value: There was an error while running the "--{0}" command. Error message: "{1}". See the logs for more details.
